=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * This is a plugin that shows some of the capabilities of the miniwin module

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin] and its dependencies
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * "mnexam Example t" will show the first example

= Screenshots =
 * Example
  http://bastmush.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/example/example.png
